code: import*as types from'../constants/actionType';var initialState=null;var myReducer=function myReducer(){var task=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case types.EDIT_TASK:task=action.task;return task;case types.NULL_TASK_EDITING:task=null;return task;default:return task;}};export default myReducer;
